messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Myrtle Beach
messages.msgSnippet: Heidi, when do you leave for Myrtle Beach?  Sorry for posting here but didn t have your E mail address. We are there the week before the conference.  We had
messages.messageBody:
Heidi, when do you leave for Myrtle Beach? Sorry for posting here but didn't
have your E mail address.

We are there the week before the conference. We had talked briefly about
getting together one day. Wanted to set a date. We have never been to
Brookgreen Gardens before. Another option is the Alligator Adventure, my boys always
have to go there. Or you had mentioned the Ripleys Aquarium. You can pick a
place we are up for anything. Also any day is OK with us during the week. And
any time after 10:00. LOL
Let me know
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
